Trade/Device Name(s): Gold Standard Diagnostics AIX1000 Rapid Plasma Reagin (RPR) Automated Test System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Gold Standard Diagnostics AIX1000 Agglutination Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics AIX1000 Rapid Plasma Reagin (RPR) Automated Test System, an automated flocculation-based analyzer for reagin antibody detection in serum to aid syphilis diagnosis
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of reagin antibodies in human serum to aid in diagnosis of syphilis, in conjunction with supplemental treponemal laboratory tests and other clinical information; detects non-treponemal antibodies for titer information; not intended for screening blood or tissue donors
